reviewHighlights.text: Do not try this game, it's not a fun experience or anything at all. This game is for a eastern oriented player base and doesn't give a damn about all...
I’ve spent a lot of time on this game since its release, and it has slowly shifted from a genuinely good experience to an aggressively pay-to-win one....
